effect.sun-moon: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. During sunny day, raises both stats by two stages.

short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user’s body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
